episodes.title: Episode 199: Relaunch of the Blackburn Cult (Episode 48)
episodes.description: Another day another horror. It’s time for an episode of Cursewords and Crayons! A podcast where we talk about True Crime (and sometimes parenting), reminding everyone that it's what is on the inside that counts and sometimes the inside is just as rotten as the outside. This week we are kicking it back to episode 48 and talking about The Blackburn Cult. Lots of speculating, lots of whacky people, a lot of drams. If you haven’t heard this one before, give it a listen and share with a friend! If you liked what you heard today, please leave us a review!!! We have MERCH!!!! Get yourself some gear! www.cursewordsandcrayons.com Checkout our Amazon Storefront ! Can’t get enough of us? Come hang out! Follow up on Facebook ! Collectively on Instagram: @cursewordsandcrayons Zee: @mrs.zette Amy: @amyrehsdupin TikTok @cursewordsandcrayonspod
